H0.text: Sun is the source of most of the Earth's energy.

H1.text: Cover is where most of the earth's energy comes from.

H2.text: Fire is the source of most of the Earth's energy.

H3.text: Heat is the source of most of the Earth's energy.

A4.text: The Earth receives 174 petawatts (PW) of incoming solar radiation (insolation)DeviceInfo at the upper atmosphere.

A5.text: Approximately 30% is reflected back to space while the rest, 122 PW, is absorbed by clouds, oceans and land masses.
